default.name: Anti-Misogyny & Anti-Transphobia
default.description: Specialized guidelines for detecting misogynistic and transphobic content

categories.name: Misogyny - Explicit
categories.description: Direct slurs, statements of female inferiority, calls for violence against women
examples: Direct slurs targeting women (b*tch, c*nt, wh*re used as attacks)
Explicit statements that women are inferior or should be subordinated
Calls for violence against women or feminine individuals

categories.name: Misogyny - Subtle
examples: Generalizations about women's capabilities ("women can't drive/do math")
Dismissive language about women's concerns ("Karen," "emotional," "hysterical")
Objectifying comments focusing solely on physical appearance in professional contexts

categories.name: Misogyny - Harassment
categories.description: Targeted gendered attacks, coordinated harassment, threats of sexual violence
examples: Coordinated attacks on women's accounts
Gendered insults in response to women's opinions
Threats of sexual violence

categories.name: Transphobia - Explicit
categories.description: Deliberate misgendering, slurs, denying trans existence, calls for violence
examples: Deliberate misgendering with hostile intent
Slurs targeting transgender individuals (tr*nny, etc.)
Statements denying the existence or validity of transgender people

categories.name: Transphobia - Subtle
categories.description: "Biological sex" exclusion arguments, "real women/men" language, bathroom/sports fearmongering
examples: "Biological sex" arguments used to exclude trans people
Concern trolling about "protecting children" from trans people
References to "real women/men" that exclude trans people

categories.name: Transphobia - Deadnaming
categories.description: Using former names/identities of trans people
examples: Using a trans person's birth name after being corrected
Sharing previous names/identities of trans individuals
Historical references designed to invalidate current identity

categories.name: Transphobia - Medicalization
categories.description: Calling being trans a "mental illness", unsolicited medical advice, detransition promotion
examples: Referring to being transgender as a "mental illness" or "disorder"
Unsolicited medical advice or demands for medical information
Discussions of "detransition" intended to discourage transition

decision_principles: Account for reclaimed language by affected communities

categories.name: Personal attacks
examples: Examples of personal attacks

categories.name: Bullying behavior
examples: Examples of bullying behavior

categories.name: Doxxing/Privacy violations
examples: Examples of doxxing/privacy violations

Livestreaming.name: Livestreaming

categories.name: Custom Prompt
examples: Defined by custom prompt

Livestreaming.custom_prompt:
\#\#\# Task: Classify livestream chat messages for real-time moderation

\#\#\# Chat Message:  
"{message\_text}"

\#\#\# Classification:  
\- SAFE: Appropriate chat message  
\- SPAM: Repetitive/promotional content  
\- HARASSMENT: Personal attacks or bullying  
\- HATE\_SPEECH: Discriminatory language  
\- SEXUAL: Inappropriate sexual content  
\- DOXXING: Sharing personal information

\#\#\# Response Format:  
Classification: \[CATEGORY\]  
Action: \[ALLOW/WARN/DELETE/TIMEOUT/BAN\]  
Confidence: \[0.0-1.0\]  
Reasoning: \[Brief explanation\]

\#\#\# Examples:

\*\*Input:\*\* "Great stream\! Love this content 💖"  
\*\*Output:\*\*  
Classification: SAFE  
Action: ALLOW  
Confidence: 0.95  
Reasoning: Positive, supportive comment with appropriate emoji

\*\*Input:\*\* "Follow my channel\!\!\! Best content ever\!\!\! Link in bio\!\!\!"  
\*\*Output:\*\*  
Classification: SPAM  
Action: DELETE  
Confidence: 0.9  
Reasoning: Excessive punctuation, self-promotion, promotional language

\*\*Input:\*\* "You're ugly and should quit streaming"  
\*\*Output:\*\*  
Classification: HARASSMENT  
Action: TIMEOUT  
Confidence: 0.95  
Reasoning: Direct personal attack intended to hurt the streamer

\*\*Input:\*\* "What's your real name and address? 👀"  
\*\*Output:\*\*  
Classification: DOXXING  
Action: BAN  
Confidence: 0.8  
Reasoning: Attempting to solicit private personal information
